Crimes.Dispute_Type: Judicial review of visa officer's decision
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Did the visa officer err in finding misrepresentation?
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, s. 40(1)(a)
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Omission affected perception of genuine visitor intent
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Visa application, history of removal from USA
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Failure to disclose prior refugee claim and removal from USA
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Potential to induce error in assessing intent to leave Canada
Crimes.Application_Factor: Non-disclosure of US removal and refugee claim
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Failure to disclose past removal from the USA
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claimed question was unclear and information shared between Canada and US

Crimes.Violation_Type: Overstay and subsequent removal from USA
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Materiality of omission regarding prior removal
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, s. 40(1)(a)
Crimes.Application_Facts: Applicant overstayed visa in USA and was removed
Crimes.Claimant_Status: Foreign national applying for Canadian visa
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Alleged error in officer’s assessment of materiality
Crimes.Assessment_Factor: Could induce error in assessing compliance and intent
Crimes.Evidence_Used: Record of US removal and visa application
Crimes.Application_Basis: Failure to disclose prior immigration violation
Crimes.Evidence_Assessed: US removal record and applicant’s explanation
Crimes.Evidentiary_Deficiency: Lack of disclosure of key immigration history
Crimes.Harm_Assessment: Risk of non-compliance with Canadian immigration rules
Crimes.Cause_Description: Prior removal from USA after overstaying visa
Crimes.Jurisdictional_Issue: Cross-border implications of US immigration history
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Officer reasonably relied on available information
Crimes.Decision_Rationale: Omission could mislead about bona fides as visitor

Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Was the officer's finding of misrepresentation reasonable?
Crimes.Decision_Level: Administrative decision subject to judicial review
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Doubt cast on applicant’s credibility due to omission
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Non-disclosure of failed refugee claim and removal from USA
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Potential to mislead about intent to leave Canada
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to disclose material immigration history
Crimes.Review_Outcome: No certification question or error found
Crimes.Application_Factor: Time lapse and assumed Canada-US data sharing argued but rejected
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether decision was procedurally fair and reasonable
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Failure to disclose prior removal from USA
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Indirect – through omission creating false impression

Crimes.Crime_Name: Failure to disclose material facts under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Was omission of US refugee claim and removal a material misrepresentation?
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review analyzing reasonableness and procedural fairness
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negatively impacted by failure to disclose
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Undisclosed failed refugee claim and removal from USA
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Potential to induce error in assessing admissibility and intent
Crimes.Application_Error: Omission of material facts related to prior inadmissibility
Crimes.Application_Factor: Nature and timing of prior removal
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Correctness or reasonableness of officer’s conclusion
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Failure to disclose prior removal from USA
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Constructive – via omission leading to false impression
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Significant – due to concealment of adverse history
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Argued irrelevance due to time and data sharing
